mapper.select: SELECT id, name, enabled, icon, sort, taxRate, IFNULL(CONCAT( '[', GROUP_CONCAT( temp ), ']' ),"") attributionList FROM ( SELECT c.id, c.NAME, c.enabled, c.icon, c.sort, c.tax_rate taxRate, CONCAT( '{"type":', a.type, ',"attributes":[', GROUP_CONCAT( CONCAT( '{"id":', a.id, ',"name":"', a.NAME, '"}' ) ), "]}" ) temp FROM `pm_goods_category` c LEFT JOIN pm_goods_rel_attribute_category ac ON c.id = ac.goods_category_id LEFT JOIN pm_goods_attribute a ON a.id = ac.goods_attribute_id WHERE if(ac.del_flag is null ,1=1,ac.del_flag = 0) AND c.id = #{id} GROUP BY a.type ) a group by a.id

select name from (WITH RECURSIVE childrenIds (id,parent_id,`name`) AS ( SELECT id,parent_id,`name` FROM pm_goods_category WHERE del_flag=0 and id= #{id} UNION ALL SELECT c.id,c.parent_id,c.`name` FROM childrenIds AS p left JOIN pm_goods_category AS c ON p.parent_id = c.id where c.del_flag=0 ) SELECT id,`name` FROM childrenIds) as t order by id

SELECT a.id FROM `pm_goods_attribute` a, pm_goods_category c, pm_goods_rel_attribute_category ac WHERE a.del_flag = 0 AND c.del_flag = 0 AND ac.del_flag = 0 AND a.NAME =#{name} AND a.id = ac.goods_attribute_id AND c.id = ac.goods_category_id AND c.id = #{cId} and a.type=#{type}
select id as value,parent_id,name label from pm_goods_category where del_flag=0 and enabled=1

select pgc1.id, pgc1.`name`, pgc1.icon, pgc1.`level` from pm_goods pg left join pm_goods_category pgc3 on pgc3.id = pg.goods_category_id left join pm_goods_category pgc2 on pgc2.id = pgc3.parent_id left join pm_goods_category pgc1 on pgc1.id = pgc2.parent_id where pg.store_id = #{storeId} and pg.verify_status = 3 and pgc2.del_flag = 0 and pgc1.del_flag = 0 and pgc3.del_flag = 0 group by pgc1.id order by pgc1.sort desc

select pgc2.id, pgc2.`name`, pgc2.icon, pgc2.`level` from pm_goods pg left join pm_goods_category pgc3 on pgc3.id = pg.goods_category_id left join pm_goods_category pgc2 on pgc2.id = pgc3.parent_id left join pm_goods_category pgc1 on pgc1.id = pgc2.parent_id where pg.store_id = #{storeId} and pgc2.del_flag = 0 and pgc3.del_flag = 0 and pgc1.id = #{goodsCategoryId} group by pgc2.id order by pgc2.sort desc

select pgc3.id, pgc3.`name`, pgc3.icon, pgc3.`level` from pm_goods pg left join pm_goods_category pgc3 on pgc3.id = pg.goods_category_id left join pm_goods_category pgc2 on pgc2.id = pgc3.parent_id where pg.store_id = #{storeId} and pgc3.del_flag = 0 and pgc2.id = #{goodsCategoryId} group by pgc3.id order by pgc3.sort desc

WITH RECURSIVE childrenIds (id,name,sort,icon,enabled,level,parent_id) AS ( (SELECT id,name,sort,icon,enabled,level,parent_id FROM pm_goods_category WHERE del_flag=0 and level=1 and enabled =1
and name like concat('%',#{t.name},'%')
and id=#{t.id}
order by sort desc limit #{offset},#{pageSize} ) UNION ALL SELECT c.id,c.name,c.sort,c.icon,c.enabled,c.level,c.parent_id FROM childrenIds AS p JOIN pm_goods_category AS c ON p.id = c.parent_id where c.del_flag=0 ) SELECT id,name,sort,icon,enabled,level,parent_id FROM childrenIds

SELECT DISTINCT id as category_id,parent_id,name as category_name,icon as category_icon FROM (WITH RECURSIVE parentIds (id,parent_id, `name`, icon, `level`) AS ( SELECT b.id,b.parent_id, b.`name`, b.icon,b.level FROM mm_advice_rel_associaiton a,pm_goods_category b WHERE a.del_flag =0 AND b.del_flag = 0 AND a.association_id = b.id AND a.advice_id = 1163808937901502466 UNION ALL SELECT c.id,c.parent_id, c.`name`, c.icon , c.`level` FROM parentIds AS p LEFT JOIN pm_goods_category AS c ON p.parent_id = c.id WHERE c.del_flag=0 ) SELECT id,parent_id, `name`, icon, `level` FROM parentIds) AS temp
select id as value,parent_id,name label from pm_goods_category where del_flag=0 and enabled=1 and level = 2
